name: Quercus, The Giant Oak
description:
"Quercus" is the story of an old oak who is slowly dying. He's the only survivor of a terrible hurricane... As he became weaker and weaker over the years, some kind of magic happened and made his roots bigger. They ended up sculpting a perfect sphere, where some little living beings developed to help him survive. They need a leader. An orchestra conductor. You can be the one who can save the Giant Oak.

Unfinished game.
